channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump wants the presidential winner to be declared on election night. That’s highly unlikely
item.description: Former President Donald Trump is stepping up calls for a winner to be declared shortly after polls close Tuesday night.

item.title: California sues LA suburb for temporary ban of homeless shelters
item.description: California has filed a lawsuit against a Los Angeles suburb over the city’s recent moratorium on homeless shelters and temporary housing.

item.title: You may have blocked someone on X but now they can see your public posts anyway
item.description: Elon Musk’s X has been modified so that accounts you’ve blocked on the social media platform can still see your public posts.
